cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu me levanto às seis todos os dias.
cards.englishTranslation: I get up at six every day.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Você pode repetir mais devagar, por favor?
cards.englishTranslation: Can you repeat it more slowly, please?
Good morning, how did you sleep?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Quase sempre tomo café e torradas no café da manhã.
cards.englishTranslation: I have coffee and toast for breakfast almost always.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu preciso tomar banho rápido porque estou atrasado.
cards.englishTranslation: I have to shower quickly because I’m running late.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu saio de casa às sete e meia.
cards.englishTranslation: I leave the house at seven thirty.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Chego ao trabalho às oito em ponto.
cards.englishTranslation: I get to work at eight on the dot.
Today I’m working from home.
What time are we having lunch?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu almoço com meus colegas nas segundas-feiras.
cards.englishTranslation: I have lunch with my coworkers on Mondays.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Depois de comer, sempre me dá sono.
cards.englishTranslation: After eating, I always get sleepy.
I finish work at five.

cards.targetLanguageWord: À tarde eu levo o cachorro para passear.
cards.englishTranslation: In the afternoon I take the dog out.

cards.targetLanguageWord: À noite eu assisto a uma série com a minha família.
cards.englishTranslation: At night I watch a show with my family.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu vou dormir tarde nos fins de semana.
cards.englishTranslation: I go to bed late on weekends.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Você pode falar mais claramente, por favor?
cards.englishTranslation: Can you speak more clearly, please?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Não entendo, você pode me explicar de novo?
cards.englishTranslation: I don’t understand, can you explain it to me again?
One moment, I’m busy right now.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Vou ao supermercado, você precisa de algo?
cards.englishTranslation: I’m going to the supermarket, do you need anything?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Está muito frio hoje, não é?
cards.englishTranslation: It’s very cold today, right?
It’s raining, take a jacket.
What time is it exactly?
It’s a quarter to three.
Today is Monday, isn’t it?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Amanhã eu não trabalho, vou descansar.
cards.englishTranslation: Tomorrow I don’t work, I rest.
Do you like getting up early?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu não gosto de cozinhar, mas eu cozinho.
cards.englishTranslation: I don’t like cooking, but I do it.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu sempre esqueço de fechar a porta.
cards.englishTranslation: I always forget to close the door.
I’m going to make dinner now.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Você pode lavar a louça, por favor?
cards.englishTranslation: Can you wash the dishes, please?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Hoje eu não estou com vontade de sair.
cards.englishTranslation: Today I don’t feel like going out.
Sorry for being late.
It’s okay, no problem.
Where are the keys?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Elas estão em cima da mesa.
cards.englishTranslation: They’re on the table.
Open the window, it’s hot.
Close the door, please.
Can I use your phone?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Estou aprendendo espanhol todos os dias.
cards.englishTranslation: I’m learning Spanish every day.
I want to practice a bit more.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu só falo um pouco de espanhol.
cards.englishTranslation: I only speak a little Spanish.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Como se diz esta palavra em espanhol?
cards.englishTranslation: How do you say this word in Spanish?
Can you write it, please?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Com licença, onde fica o banheiro?
cards.englishTranslation: Excuse me, where is the bathroom?
I live near here.
I’m ready, we can go.
I’m not ready yet.

cards.targetLanguageWord: É a primeira vez que venho aqui.
cards.englishTranslation: It’s the first time I come here.
I like this city.
I don’t have much time.
Just a minute, please.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Você pode me ajudar com isso?
cards.englishTranslation: Can you help me with this?
Thank you very much for your help.
You’re welcome, gladly.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Minha irmã é muito trabalhadora, mas hoje está cansada.
cards.englishTranslation: My sister is very hard-working, but today she is tired.
Whose notebook is this?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu tenho dois irmãos e uma irmã mais nova.
cards.englishTranslation: I have two brothers and a younger sister.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Minha mãe mora em outra cidade.
cards.englishTranslation: My mom lives in another city.
My dad is very funny.
My grandparents are from Mexico.
Do you have children?
My son is eight years old.
My daughter is very creative.
This is my best friend.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Ela é alta e tem cabelo preto.
cards.englishTranslation: She is tall and has black hair.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Ele é baixo, mas muito forte.
cards.englishTranslation: He is short but very strong.
We are a very close family.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Meu primo vai se casar no sábado.
cards.englishTranslation: My cousin is getting married on Saturday.
What is your family like?
My husband works a lot.
My wife is a teacher.
I’m single for now.
I have been married for ten years.
We are busy today.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Estou na casa dos meus pais.
cards.englishTranslation: I’m at my parents’ house.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Minha casa é pequena, mas confortável.
cards.englishTranslation: My house is small but comfortable.
Whose dog is this?
It’s my brother’s.
This phone is not mine.
Our neighbor is very kind.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Meu chefe é um pouco rígido.
cards.englishTranslation: My boss is a little strict.
Today I’m very happy.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Ela está triste porque a amiga dela não veio.
cards.englishTranslation: She is sad because her friend didn’t come.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Somos daqui, mas moramos em outro país.
cards.englishTranslation: We’re from here, but we live in another country.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Meu irmão mais velho mora na Espanha.
cards.englishTranslation: My older brother lives in Spain.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Minha tia está doente, vou visitá-la.
cards.englishTranslation: My aunt is sick, I’m going to visit her.
This boy is very smart.
My niece is very affectionate.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Hoje eu não estou de bom humor.
cards.englishTranslation: I’m not in a good mood today.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Você está muito bonita com esse vestido.
cards.englishTranslation: You look very pretty in that dress.
They are very different.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Ele é sério, mas ela é muito falante.
cards.englishTranslation: He is serious, but she is very talkative.
We have been friends since school.
I want to meet your family.
My last name is very common.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Como se escreve o seu nome?
cards.englishTranslation: How do you spell your name?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Ele está sempre de bom humor.
cards.englishTranslation: He is always in a good mood.
You are very quiet today.
My parents are on vacation.

cards.targetLanguageWord: A casa deles é longe daqui.
cards.englishTranslation: Their house is far from here.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Essa garota é minha colega de trabalho.
cards.englishTranslation: That girl is my coworker.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Esse senhor é nosso novo vizinho.
cards.englishTranslation: This man is our new neighbor.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Ele não é meu namorado, é só um amigo.
cards.englishTranslation: He’s not my boyfriend, he’s just a friend.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Minha família por parte do cônjuge é muito grande.
cards.englishTranslation: My in-laws are very big/family is very big.
There are five of us at home.
My parents are retired.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Pode me trazer uma garrafa de água, por favor?
cards.englishTranslation: Could you bring me a bottle of water, please?
How much is it in total?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu gostaria de uma mesa para duas pessoas, por favor.
cards.englishTranslation: I would like a table for two, please.
Do you have a menu in English?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Qual é o prato do dia?
cards.englishTranslation: What is today’s special?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu gostaria de provar algo típico.
cards.englishTranslation: I would like to try something typical.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Para mim, uma sopa e uma salada.
cards.englishTranslation: For me, a soup and a salad.
What do you recommend?
It’s very tasty, thank you.
The check, please.
Can I pay with card?
Do you have anything gluten-free?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Sou alérgico a frutos do mar.
cards.englishTranslation: I’m allergic to seafood.
I don’t eat meat.
Can you bring me more water?
How much do these apples cost?
Do you have something cheaper?
I’m just looking, thank you.
Where is the checkout?
I want to return this product.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Ficou um pouco grande em mim.
cards.englishTranslation: It’s a bit big on me.
Do you have a smaller size?
I’ll take it.
Is the service included?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Você pode me dar uma sacola?
cards.englishTranslation: Can you give me a bag?
The soup is cold.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Isso não foi o que eu pedi.
cards.englishTranslation: This is not what I ordered.
Sorry, how much was it?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Tem desconto se eu comprar dois?
cards.englishTranslation: Is there a discount if I buy two?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Estou procurando um presente para minha mãe.
cards.englishTranslation: I’m looking for a gift for my mom.
Are you open on Sundays?
What time do you close?
Can I try it on?
Do you have change for 50?
I want something to go.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Para comer aqui ou para viagem?
cards.englishTranslation: For here or to go?
It’s very expensive.
It’s on sale today.
I love this restaurant.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Quero reservar uma mesa para hoje à noite.
cards.englishTranslation: I want to book a table for tonight.
Do you have desserts?
What is this?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Vem com arroz ou com batatas?
cards.englishTranslation: Does it come with rice or with potatoes?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Você pode me dar a receita?
cards.englishTranslation: Can you give me the recipe?
Pay for it at the counter, please.
The service was excellent.
The food arrived very late.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu não tenho dinheiro em espécie.
cards.englishTranslation: I don’t have cash.
Do you accept Apple Pay?
I’m missing a drink.
How much is it per kilo?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu queria só uma garrafa pequena.
cards.englishTranslation: I only wanted a small bottle.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Vamos sair às oito, você quer vir?
cards.englishTranslation: We’re going to go out at eight, do you want to come?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Onde fica o ponto de ônibus mais perto?
cards.englishTranslation: Where is the nearest bus stop?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Preciso de um táxi para o aeroporto.
cards.englishTranslation: I need a taxi to the airport.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Quanto tempo leva até o centro?
cards.englishTranslation: How long does it take to get downtown?
I’m going to travel tomorrow morning.
What time does the train leave?
Where can I buy the tickets?
I’m going to visit some friends.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Quero ir à praia neste fim de semana.
cards.englishTranslation: I want to go to the beach this weekend.
Is it far from here?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Siga em frente e depois vire à direita.
cards.englishTranslation: Go straight ahead and then turn right.
It’s two blocks away.
I don’t know where I am.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Você pode me mostrar no mapa?
cards.englishTranslation: Can you show me on the map?
We’re going to be late.
I’ll wait for you at the entrance.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Você quer ir ao cinema hoje à noite?
cards.englishTranslation: Do you want to go to the movies tonight?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Hoje não posso, mas amanhã sim.
cards.englishTranslation: I can’t today, but I can tomorrow.
I have an appointment at four.
Is there a direct bus?
I missed the train.
My flight is delayed.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu reservei um hotel perto do centro.
cards.englishTranslation: I booked a hotel near the center.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Onde fica o escritório de turismo?
cards.englishTranslation: Where is the tourist office?
I want to see the historic center.
How much is the ticket?
We’re going on a trip tomorrow.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Você pode me dar uma carona?
cards.englishTranslation: Can you give me a ride in your car?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu não tenho carro, vou de trem.
cards.englishTranslation: I don’t have a car, I go by train.

cards.targetLanguageWord: A que horas a gente se vê?
cards.englishTranslation: What time are we meeting?

cards.targetLanguageWord: A gente se vê às sete no parque.
cards.englishTranslation: See you at seven in the park.
I’m on my way.
I’ll arrive in ten minutes.
Where can I park?
This place is very touristy.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu gostaria de um quarto com vista para o mar.
cards.englishTranslation: I’d like a room with a sea view.

cards.targetLanguageWord: O café da manhã está incluído?
cards.englishTranslation: Is breakfast included?
I’m going to be here for a week.
Can I leave my suitcase here?
I’m looking for this address.
Does this bus go through downtown?
Get off at the next stop.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Onde fica a estação de metrô?
cards.englishTranslation: Where is the subway station?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Vamos organizar uma viagem em dezembro.
cards.englishTranslation: We’re going to organize a trip in December.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Quero mudar a data do voo.
cards.englishTranslation: I want to change the flight date.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Não encontro meu portão de embarque.
cards.englishTranslation: I can’t find my boarding gate.
How much luggage can I take?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Preciso de um mapa da cidade.
cards.englishTranslation: I need a map of the city.
Are there guided tours?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Estou perdido, você pode me ajudar?
cards.englishTranslation: I’m lost, can you help me?
Let’s go together, it’s easier.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Ontem eu não pude ir porque eu estava trabalhando.
cards.englishTranslation: Yesterday I couldn’t go because I was working.
I lost my credit card.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Estou com dor de cabeça desde ontem.
cards.englishTranslation: My head has been hurting since yesterday.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Preciso de uma consulta com o médico.
cards.englishTranslation: I need an appointment with the doctor.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Hoje eu não estou me sentindo muito bem.
cards.englishTranslation: I don’t feel very well today.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Perdi minhas chaves e não consigo entrar.
cards.englishTranslation: I lost my keys and I can’t get in.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu esqueci de pagar a conta.
cards.englishTranslation: I forgot to pay the bill.
The internet isn’t working.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Ontem eu tive um problema com o banco.
cards.englishTranslation: Yesterday I had a problem with the bank.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu já liguei para o suporte técnico.
cards.englishTranslation: I already called technical support.

cards.targetLanguageWord: O carro não pegou hoje de manhã.
cards.englishTranslation: The car didn’t start this morning.
My battery died.
My wallet was stolen.
Where can I file a report?
It wasn’t my fault.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Cheguei atrasado porque tinha muito trânsito.
cards.englishTranslation: I was late because there was a lot of traffic.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu não pude ir porque estava chovendo muito.
cards.englishTranslation: I couldn’t go because it was raining a lot.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu caí e machuquei a perna.
cards.englishTranslation: I fell and hurt my leg.
Is there a pharmacy nearby?
I need to buy medicine.
Can you repeat the address?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu não ouvi direito o que você disse.
cards.englishTranslation: I didn’t hear well what you said.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Na semana passada eu viajei para outra cidade.
cards.englishTranslation: Last week I traveled to another city.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Ontem à noite jantamos em um restaurante novo.
cards.englishTranslation: Last night we had dinner at a new restaurant.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Ano passado eu estudei espanhol online.
cards.englishTranslation: Last year I studied Spanish online.
I already finished the work.
I still haven’t received the email.
I called you a little while ago.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu esqueci de responder sua mensagem.
cards.englishTranslation: I forgot to reply to your message.
I was waiting for you.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu não sabia que você vinha.
cards.englishTranslation: I didn’t know you were coming.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Achei que você já tinha saído.
cards.englishTranslation: I thought you had already left.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu gostaria de esclarecer um mal-entendido.
cards.englishTranslation: I’d like to clear up a misunderstanding.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Não foi isso que eu quis dizer.
cards.englishTranslation: That’s not what I meant to say.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Acho que houve um erro na fatura.
cards.englishTranslation: I think there was a mistake in the bill.
Can I speak to the person in charge?

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu não recebi o pedido completo.
cards.englishTranslation: I didn’t receive the full order.
The air conditioner broke.
There was no hot water.
They already fixed it.
What happened yesterday?
Something unexpected happened.
They told me to call today.
They canceled my appointment.
I did it, but it didn’t work.
I already tried everything.
I couldn’t sleep well.
I’m waiting for a reply.

cards.targetLanguageWord: Eu não me lembro da senha.
cards.englishTranslation: I don’t remember the password.

cards.targetLanguageWord: A luz caiu ontem à noite.
cards.englishTranslation: The power went out last night.
I ran out of money.

decks.description: Common problems, at the doctor/bank/hotel, excuses, clarifying
